CNN: White House journalist Helen Thomas, 92, has died 9:53 AM

Storms to bring relief from heat wave

Temperatures will reach the 90s once more before thunderstorms move in this afternoon and evening, whipping up strong winds, heavy rain, and lightning to finally usher in cooler weather, forecasters said.
  • Graphic Heat wave among Boston's longest | weather wisdom New record high in Hub | Watch Forecast

Storms down trees, cause outages in Vt.

More than 4,000 households in Vermont are still without electricity after powerful storms ripped through the Vermont and northern New York, knocking down trees and power lines.
  • Power outages strike Maine

Woman's roller coaster death in Texas probed

Some witnesses said the woman who died Friday while riding the roller coaster at a Six Flags in North Texas fell after not being properly secured by park staff.
